languages.text: "Рад, что вы с нами, Ваша Светлость. К этой драке надо хорошо подготовиться. Как говорил один мой... коллега, если не пораскинул мозгами, выбирая хорошее укрытие, раскинешь ими в драке. Эта фраза звучит особенно иронично, если знать, как он умер. Я прошу вас оценить, все ли у нас готово, чтобы принять в гости леди Инцендию".

"I'm glad you're with us, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. This is a fight we must be well prepared for. As a... colleague of mine used to say, if your brain doesn't hurt from all that thinking of where to hide, it'll discover even your skull isn't thick enough once the fight is on. Which sounds especially ironic considering how he died. I'd like to ask your opinion on how prepared we are to entertain Lady Incendia."
languages.original_text: "Рад, что вы с нами, Ваша Светлость. К этой драке надо хорошо подготовиться. Как говорил один мой... коллега, если не пораскинул мозгами, выбирая хорошее укрытие, раскинешь ими в драке. Эта фраза звучит особенно иронично, если знать, как он умер. Я прошу вас оценить, все ли у нас готово, чтобы принять в гости леди Инцендию".

languages.text: “我很高兴能与您并肩作战，大人。我们必须为这场战斗做好充分准备。就像我之前的……某个同事经常说的那样，如果战斗之前你没有绞尽脑汁地思考战局，那等到真的开战之后，你的脑汁很快就会被敌人的子弹榨出来。考虑到那个人的死法，这句话现在听起来真是相当讽刺。我想问问您的意见，您已经做好准备，好好招待因森蒂娅女士一番了吗？”
languages.original_text: "I'm glad you're with us, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. This is a fight we must be well prepared for. As a... colleague of mine used to say, if your brain doesn't hurt from all that thinking of where to hide, it'll discover even your skull isn't thick enough once the fight is on. Which sounds especially ironic considering how he died. I'd like to ask your opinion on how prepared we are to entertain Lady Incendia."

traits.locale_text: “我很高兴能与您并肩作战，大人。我们必须为这场战斗做好充分准备。就像我之前的……某个同事经常说的那样，如果战斗之前你没有绞尽脑汁地思考战局，那等到真的开战之后，你的脑汁很快就会被敌人的子弹榨出来。考虑到那个人的死法，这句话现在听起来真是相当讽刺。我想问问您的意见，您已经做好准备，好好招待因森蒂娅女士一番了吗？”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: 「陛下、ご一緒できて光栄だ。これは万全の準備が必要な戦いだ。私の同僚が昔、よく言っていたな…戦で隠れる場所を考えても、脳は痛まないかもしれない。だが、戦いが始まれば頭蓋骨の厚ささえ足りないことがわかるだろう。同僚の死因を考えると、より一層皮肉なもんだ。インセンディア様をもてなす準備がどの程度できているのか、君のご意見を伺いたい」
languages.original_text: "I'm glad you're with us, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. This is a fight we must be well prepared for. As a... colleague of mine used to say, if your brain doesn't hurt from all that thinking of where to hide, it'll discover even your skull isn't thick enough once the fight is on. Which sounds especially ironic considering how he died. I'd like to ask your opinion on how prepared we are to entertain Lady Incendia."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、ご一緒できて光栄だ。これは万全の準備が必要な戦いだ。私の同僚が昔、よく言っていたな…戦で隠れる場所を考えても、脳は痛まないかもしれない。だが、戦いが始まれば頭蓋骨の厚ささえ足りないことがわかるだろう。同僚の死因を考えると、より一層皮肉なもんだ。インセンディア様をもてなす準備がどの程度できているのか、君のご意見を伺いたい」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: «Me alegro de que esté con nosotros, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Esta es una lucha para la que debemos estar bien preparados. Como solía decir un... colega mío: si no te duele la cabeza de tanto pensar dónde esconderte, descubrirás que ni siquiera tu cráneo es lo suficientemente grueso una vez que comience la lucha. Lo que suena especialmente irónico teniendo en cuenta cómo murió. Me gustaría pedirle su opinión sobre lo preparados que estamos para entretener a Lady Incendia».
languages.original_text: "I'm glad you're with us, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. This is a fight we must be well prepared for. As a... colleague of mine used to say, if your brain doesn't hurt from all that thinking of where to hide, it'll discover even your skull isn't thick enough once the fight is on. Which sounds especially ironic considering how he died. I'd like to ask your opinion on how prepared we are to entertain Lady Incendia."

Como solía decir un... colega mío: si no te duele la cabeza de tanto pensar dónde esconderte, descubrirás que ni siquiera tu cráneo es lo suficientemente grueso una vez que comience la lucha. Lo que suena especialmente irónico teniendo en cuenta cómo murió. Me gustaría pedirle su opinión sobre lo preparados que estamos para entretener a Lady Incendia».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Ich bin froh, dass Ihr bei uns seid, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Das ist ein Kampf, auf den wir gut vorbereitet sein müssen. Wie ein ... Kollege von mir immer gesagt hat: Wenn das Gehirn nicht vom vielen Überlegen wehtut, wo es sich verstecken soll, dann findet es im Kampf heraus, dass nicht einmal der eigene Schädel dick genug dafür ist. Was besonders ironisch ist, wenn man bedenkt, wie er gestorben ist. Mich würde Eure Meinung interessieren, wie gut wir darauf vorbereitet sind, Lady Incendia zu unterhalten."
languages.original_text: "I'm glad you're with us, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. This is a fight we must be well prepared for. As a... colleague of mine used to say, if your brain doesn't hurt from all that thinking of where to hide, it'll discover even your skull isn't thick enough once the fight is on. Which sounds especially ironic considering how he died. I'd like to ask your opinion on how prepared we are to entertain Lady Incendia."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin froh, dass Ihr bei uns seid, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Das ist ein Kampf, auf den wir gut vorbereitet sein müssen. Wie ein ... Kollege von mir immer gesagt hat: Wenn das Gehirn nicht vom vielen Überlegen wehtut, wo es sich verstecken soll, dann findet es im Kampf heraus, dass nicht einmal der eigene Schädel dick genug dafür ist. Was besonders ironisch ist, wenn man bedenkt, wie er gestorben ist. Mich würde Eure Meinung interessieren, wie gut wir darauf vorbereitet sind, Lady Incendia zu unterhalten."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: « Je suis ravi que vous soyez à nos côtés, Votre Seigneurie. C'est un combat pour lequel nous devons bien nous préparer. Pour citer l'un de mes... collègues : "si tu ne te creuses pas la cervelle pour trouver une bonne cachette, tu peux être sûr que quelqu'un te la fera sauter une fois le combat engagé". D'ailleurs, c'est assez ironique quand on sait comment il est mort... Bref, j'aimerais vous demander si vous pensez que nous sommes prêts à recevoir dame Incendia. »
languages.original_text: "I'm glad you're with us, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. This is a fight we must be well prepared for. As a... colleague of mine used to say, if your brain doesn't hurt from all that thinking of where to hide, it'll discover even your skull isn't thick enough once the fight is on. Which sounds especially ironic considering how he died. I'd like to ask your opinion on how prepared we are to entertain Lady Incendia."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis ravi que vous soyez à nos côtés, Votre Seigneurie. C'est un combat pour lequel nous devons bien nous préparer. Pour citer l'un de mes... collègues : "si tu ne te creuses pas la cervelle pour trouver une bonne cachette, tu peux être sûr que quelqu'un te la fera sauter une fois le combat engagé". D'ailleurs, c'est assez ironique quand on sait comment il est mort... Bref, j'aimerais vous demander si vous pensez que nous sommes prêts à recevoir dame Incendia. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, iyi ki yanımızdasınız. Bu savaşa iyi hazırlanmamız şart. Bir... Meslektaşımın da dediği gibi 'Kaçacak yer aramaktan başın ağrımazsa yiyeceğin kötekten daha çok ağrırmış.' Gerçi nasıl öldüğünü düşünürsek epey ironik bir söz oluyor. Leydi İncendia'nın karşısında ne denli tertipli olduğumuzun bir değerlendirmesini de sizden almak isterim."
languages.original_text: "I'm glad you're with us, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. This is a fight we must be well prepared for. As a... colleague of mine used to say, if your brain doesn't hurt from all that thinking of where to hide, it'll discover even your skull isn't thick enough once the fight is on. Which sounds especially ironic considering how he died. I'd like to ask your opinion on how prepared we are to entertain Lady Incendia."

Leydi İncendia'nın karşısında ne denli tertipli olduğumuzun bir değerlendirmesini de sizden almak isterim."
